languages.text: Желая выполнить приказ Лорд-капитана и собрать данные о новом, не изученном феномене, исследователи с готовностью отправляются в неизвестность. Едва шаттл с техническим оборудованием и лучшими умами на борту входит в атмосферу планеты, связь с ним прерывается. Сквозь витражи капитанского мостика видно, как челнок навсегда исчезает в череде молниеносных бело-алых взрывов.

traits.locale_text: Желая выполнить приказ Лорд-капитана и собрать данные о новом, не изученном феномене, исследователи с готовностью отправляются в неизвестность. Едва шаттл с техническим оборудованием и лучшими умами на борту входит в атмосферу планеты, связь с ним прерывается. Сквозь витражи капитанского мостика видно, как челнок навсегда исчезает в череде молниеносных бело-алых взрывов.

languages.text: Wanting to execute the Lord Captain's orders and gather data about the new, unstudied phenomenon, the explorers readily set off into the unknown. A shuttle with technical equipment and the best minds on board descends into the planet's atmosphere, where the connection with it suddenly cuts off. Behind the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge, the shuttle disappears forever in a series of lightning-fast white and scarlet explosions.
languages.original_text: Желая выполнить приказ Лорд-капитана и собрать данные о новом, не изученном феномене, исследователи с готовностью отправляются в неизвестность. Едва шаттл с техническим оборудованием и лучшими умами на борту входит в атмосферу планеты, связь с ним прерывается. Сквозь витражи капитанского мостика видно, как челнок навсегда исчезает в череде молниеносных бело-алых взрывов.

traits.locale_text: Wanting to execute the Lord Captain's orders and gather data about the new, unstudied phenomenon, the explorers readily set off into the unknown. As soon as the shuttle with technical equipment and the best minds on board enters the planet's atmosphere, the connection with it cuts off. Behind the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge, the shuttle disappears forever in a series of lightning-fast white and scarlet explosions.

As soon as the shuttle with technical equipment and the best minds on board enters the planet's atmosphere, the connection with it cuts off. Behind the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge, the shuttle disappears forever in a series of lightning-fast white and scarlet explosions.

Behind the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge, the shuttle disappears forever in a series of lightning-fast white and scarlet explosions.

A shuttle with technical equipment and the best minds on board descends into the planet's atmosphere, where the connection with it suddenly cuts off. Behind the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge, the shuttle disappears forever in a series of lightning-fast white and scarlet explosions.

Wanting to execute the Lord Captain's orders and gather data about the new, unstudied phenomenon, the explorers readily set off into the unknown. A shuttle with technical equipment and the best minds on board descends into the planet's atmosphere, where the connection with it suddenly cuts off. Behind the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge, the shuttle disappears forever in a series of lightning-fast white and scarlet explosions.

languages.text: 探险队员欣然接受任务，前往这颗未知的行星，这既是为了执行领主舰长的命令，也是为了为这未涉猎过的全新现象收集数据。一架满载技术设备与最优秀人才的穿梭机进入了这颗行星的大气层，但随后，穿梭机就与飞船失去了联系。透过舰桥的彩色玻璃窗，船员们看到那艘穿梭机发生了一连串红白相间的爆炸，随后就彻底消失了。
languages.original_text: Wanting to execute the Lord Captain's orders and gather data about the new, unstudied phenomenon, the explorers readily set off into the unknown. A shuttle with technical equipment and the best minds on board descends into the planet's atmosphere, where the connection with it suddenly cuts off. Behind the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge, the shuttle disappears forever in a series of lightning-fast white and scarlet explosions.

traits.locale_text: 探险队员欣然接受任务，前往这颗未知的行星，这既是为了执行领主舰长的命令，也是为了为这未涉猎过的全新现象收集数据。一架满载技术设备与最优秀人才的穿梭机进入了这颗行星的大气层，但随后，穿梭机就与飞船失去了联系。透过舰桥的彩色玻璃窗，船员们看到那艘穿梭机发生了一连串红白相间的爆炸，随后就彻底消失了。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンの命令を実行し、未調査の新現象に関するデータを収集するため、探検家たちは未知の世界へと旅立った。技術機器と最高の頭脳を乗せたシャトルが惑星の大気圏に降下した途端、突然シャトルとの接続が切れる。船長のブリッジにあるステンドグラス窓の向こうで、シャトルは稲妻のような速さで白と緋色の爆発を繰り返しながら永遠の闇に消えていった。
languages.original_text: Wanting to execute the Lord Captain's orders and gather data about the new, unstudied phenomenon, the explorers readily set off into the unknown. A shuttle with technical equipment and the best minds on board descends into the planet's atmosphere, where the connection with it suddenly cuts off. Behind the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge, the shuttle disappears forever in a series of lightning-fast white and scarlet explosions.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンの命令を実行し、未調査の新現象に関するデータを収集するため、探検家たちは未知の世界へと旅立った。技術機器と最高の頭脳を乗せたシャトルが惑星の大気圏に降下した途端、突然シャトルとの接続が切れる。船長のブリッジにあるステンドグラス窓の向こうで、シャトルは稲妻のような速さで白と緋色の爆発を繰り返しながら永遠の闇に消えていった。

languages.text: Deseosos de cumplir las órdenes {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán y de reunir datos sobre el nuevo fenómeno que aún no ha sido estudiado, los exploradores parten de inmediato hacia lo desconocido. Una lanzadera con equipos técnicos y las mejores mentes a bordo desciende a la atmósfera del planeta, donde la conexión se corta repentinamente. Detrás de las vidrieras del puente del capitán, la lanzadera desaparece para siempre en una serie de explosiones brillantes de color blanco y escarlata.
languages.original_text: Wanting to execute the Lord Captain's orders and gather data about the new, unstudied phenomenon, the explorers readily set off into the unknown. A shuttle with technical equipment and the best minds on board descends into the planet's atmosphere, where the connection with it suddenly cuts off. Behind the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge, the shuttle disappears forever in a series of lightning-fast white and scarlet explosions.

traits.locale_text: Deseosos de cumplir las órdenes {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán y de reunir datos sobre el nuevo fenómeno que aún no ha sido estudiado, los exploradores parten de inmediato hacia lo desconocido. Una lanzadera con equipos técnicos y las mejores mentes a bordo desciende a la atmósfera del planeta, donde la conexión se corta repentinamente. Detrás de las vidrieras del puente del capitán, la lanzadera desaparece para siempre en una serie de explosiones brillantes de color blanco y escarlata.

languages.text: Der Erkundungstrupp ist begierig darauf, die Befehle des Lord Captains auszuführen und Daten zu dem neuen, noch nicht erforschten Phänomen zu sammeln. Sie ziehen sofort aus ins Unbekannte. Ein Shuttle mit technischer Ausrüstung und den klügsten Köpfen an Bord fliegt hinab in die Atmosphäre des Planeten, wo die Verbindung plötzlich abbricht. Vor dem Buntglasfenster der Brücke verschwindet das Shuttle für immer ... durch eine Reihe blitzschneller, weiß-roter Explosionen.
languages.original_text: Wanting to execute the Lord Captain's orders and gather data about the new, unstudied phenomenon, the explorers readily set off into the unknown. A shuttle with technical equipment and the best minds on board descends into the planet's atmosphere, where the connection with it suddenly cuts off. Behind the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge, the shuttle disappears forever in a series of lightning-fast white and scarlet explosions.

traits.locale_text: Der Erkundungstrupp ist begierig darauf, die Befehle des Lord Captains auszuführen und Daten zu dem neuen, noch nicht erforschten Phänomen zu sammeln. Sie ziehen sofort aus ins Unbekannte. Ein Shuttle mit technischer Ausrüstung und den klügsten Köpfen an Bord fliegt hinab in die Atmosphäre des Planeten, wo die Verbindung plötzlich abbricht. Vor dem Buntglasfenster der Brücke verschwindet das Shuttle für immer ... durch eine Reihe blitzschneller, weiß-roter Explosionen.

languages.text: Déterminés à exécuter les ordres {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} et à recueillir des données sur ce mystérieux phénomène, les explorateurs s'aventurent vaillamment dans l'inconnu. Une navette embarquant à son bord une batterie de matériel et les plus brillants esprits du vaisseau amiral descend dans l'atmosphère de la planète, où la connexion est subitement coupée. À travers les baies vitrées de la passerelle, le module disparaît à tout jamais au cours d'une série de fulgurantes explosions blanches et rouges.
languages.original_text: Wanting to execute the Lord Captain's orders and gather data about the new, unstudied phenomenon, the explorers readily set off into the unknown. A shuttle with technical equipment and the best minds on board descends into the planet's atmosphere, where the connection with it suddenly cuts off. Behind the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge, the shuttle disappears forever in a series of lightning-fast white and scarlet explosions.

traits.locale_text: Déterminés à exécuter les ordres {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} et à recueillir des données sur ce mystérieux phénomène, les explorateurs s'aventurent vaillamment dans l'inconnu. Une navette embarquant à son bord une batterie de matériel et les plus brillants esprits du vaisseau amiral descend dans l'atmosphère de la planète, où la connexion est subitement coupée. À travers les baies vitrées de la passerelle, le module disparaît à tout jamais au cours d'une série de fulgurantes explosions blanches et rouges.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın emirlerini yerine getirmeye ve bu gizemli fenomen hakkında veri toplamaya kararlı kâşifler, bilinmeyene doğru yola çıkıyor. Teknik ekipmanlarla ve gemideki en parlak beyinlerle gezegene yollanan mekik atmosfere giriş yapar yapmaz bağlantı kopuyor. Kaptan köprüsünden bakanlar; göz kamaştırıcı, beyazlı kırmızılı bir dizi patlamayla birlikte mekiğinin sonsuza dek yok olduğunu görüyor.
languages.original_text: Wanting to execute the Lord Captain's orders and gather data about the new, unstudied phenomenon, the explorers readily set off into the unknown. A shuttle with technical equipment and the best minds on board descends into the planet's atmosphere, where the connection with it suddenly cuts off. Behind the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge, the shuttle disappears forever in a series of lightning-fast white and scarlet explosions.
